title: NO PAGE TODAY
author: JGray
text:
There won't be a page until Thursday. I do apologize. Unfortunately, Keith's not been able to get much sleep in the past week. I insisted him trying to actually visit dreamland was more important than the update.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
As someone who occasionally does not get enough sleep for several days in a row, I heartily concur!

Health is important, guys! And getting enough sleep goes a long way towards it.
